headline: UPS RFID Rollout Puts Automation And Service Quality In Investor Focus
summary: United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS) is rolling out RFID package tracking across all 5,500 The UPS Store locations. The move expands UPS's "Smart Package Smart Facility" program, aiming to improve shipment visibility and reduce handling errors. RFID labels are expected to support more precise tracking for both individual and commercial customers using The UPS Store network. UPS, trading at $116.74, is adding this RFID rollout on top of a mixed multi year return profile, with shares up 12.6%...
